movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.introduction: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
movies.writer: Stephen King (short story "Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption"), Frank Darabont (screenplay)
movies.stars: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.introduction: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
movies.writer: Mario Puzo (screenplay by), Francis Ford Coppola (screenplay by)
movies.stars: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.introduction: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.
movies.stars: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.introduction: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
movies.writer: J.R.R. Tolkien (novel), Fran Walsh (screenplay), Philippa Boyens (screenplay), Peter Jackson (screenplay)
movies.stars: Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.introduction: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
movies.writer: Quentin Tarantino (stories), Roger Avary (stories), Quentin Tarantino
movies.stars: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.introduction: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
movies.stars: Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Ben Kingsley

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.introduction: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
movies.writer: J.R.R. Tolkien (novel), Fran Walsh (screenplay), Philippa Boyens (screenplay), Peter Jackson (screenplay)
movies.stars: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.introduction: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.
movies.stars: Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Helena Bonham Carter

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.introduction: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.
movies.stars: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise

movies.title: Inception
movies.introduction: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.
movies.stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page
